jodd.madvoc.proxetta

Class ProxettaAwareActionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.component.ActionsManager
      • jodd.madvoc.proxetta.ProxettaAwareActionsManager

  • public class ProxettaAwareActionsManager
extends ActionsManager
    Madvoc actions manager that works with Proxetta.

      • registerAction

        public ActionRuntime registerAction(java.lang.Class actionClass,
                                    java.lang.reflect.Method actionMethod,
                                    ActionDefinition actionDefinition)
        Registers actions and applies proxetta on actions that are not already registered. We need to define ActionDefinition before we apply the proxy, using target action class.
        Overrides:
        registerAction in class ActionsManager
        See Also:
        ActionsManager.registerActionRuntime(ActionRuntime)
